about_the_game:
Following the mysterious death of a crewmate,  the opium clipper The Witch of the Wake must make a unscheduled stop on their way to Canton. Loaded down with illicit cargo, the unexpected detour weighs heavily on the crew spirits. To make matters worse, not long after picking up a young man in Penang, strange -- almost supernatural -- occurrences begin plaguing the ship; sowing dissent and causing the crew to turn against each other.

Nieve Torres, navigator aboard the vessel, is left fighting for her life to combat these sinister forces... but is this unknown threat the only thing standing in the way of survival?

Terror and tragedy abound, Nieve is left navigating not just rough waters, but her fellow crewmates, as well.

The Witch of the Wake is a seafaring supernatural horror/thriller visual novel inspired by media such as The Thing, The Terror, and Return of the Obra Dinn.

This game incorporates mature content and themes including physical violence, suggestive sexual content, drug abuse, and visual and written depictions of gore.

  • This tense, thrilling visual novel is brimming with intrigue, deception, and death. Featuring 15,000+ words and five unique endings, even the 'true' end embraces its fair share of horror and gore.

  • A unique and diverse cast of characters including queer representation bring The Witch of the Wake to life... but be warned, you can't save them all.

  • Original art styled to fit the dark tone sets the mood for what's to come; including six backgrounds, six character sprites, three in-game illustrations, and plenty of blood.

  • A haunting original soundtrack with 5+ unique tracks has been artfully crafted to send shivers down your spine.

Terra Babcock - Story dev, narrative design, writing, programming
Johan Faulstich - Story dev, character design, illustration, copywrite
Walksoftly - Original soundtrack, miscellaneous
Avocaaaaaado - Interior background modeling
BaiYu - Social media, miscellaneous

The model ship used to draft exterior backgrounds was created by sunflowerkesu and is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution.

content_descriptors.notes: Detailed descriptions of gore and violence, illustrated depictions of blood, implied consensual sex, illicit drug use.
